comment.author: 37996646559@N01
comment._content:
Darrow: The first day – was it a twenty-four hour day?
Bryan: I do not know.
Darrow: What do you think?
Bryan: I do not think about things that I do not think
about
Darrow: Do you ever think about things you DO think
about?

comment._content: See a blog post about this photo here: http://blog.photography.si.edu/2010/02/08/perspectives/ And thank you, Mr Flikker, for your notes about the trial!
